query.zql: case.status%2C case.num_unaccepted_updates%2C case.num_unaccepted_files%2C case.num_unread_communication%2C case.number%2C date_created%2C case.date_of_completion%2C case.number_previous%2C case.subject_external%2C attribute.test_documenten%2C case.newtab%2C case.casetype.name%2C case.subject%2C case.requestor.name%2C case.days_left%2C case.archival_state%2C case.destructable%2C case.date_target FROM case WHERE (case.status %3D "resolved") AND (case.casetype.id %3D 1511) ORDER BY case.number DESC%26zapi_num_rows=20%26zapi_order_by=case.number%26zapi_order_by_direction=desc%26zapi_page=1
